title: Jon Goddard
text:
Jonathan Goddard (born 21 June 1982) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer.
He played for amateur clubs Smawthorne Panthers and Castleford Panthers before playing for <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Castleford%20Tigers%20players">Heritage № 771</a>), <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Oldham%20R.L.F.C.%20players">Heritage № 1121</a>), <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a> and <a href="Halifax%20RLFC">Halifax RLFC</a>.
He signed for <a href="Hull%20Kingston%20Rovers">Hull Kingston Rovers</a> in November 2005, he was released by Hull Kingston Rovers on 17 September 2007, but he was quickly signed up by <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a>. In September 2009, he was re-signed by Halifax to a 2-year contract until the end of 2011.
In April 2014, Goddard signed as a fitness instructor for <a href="Doncaster">Doncaster</a>'s health club Eco Fitness. He later signed with <a href="Penryn%20RFC">Penryn RFC</a> in May 2016 as fitness coach.
Background.
Jonathan Goddard was born in <a href="Pontefract">Pontefract</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire">West Yorkshire</a>, England.
